thread.title: Tokyo launches design competition for new Olympic logo
thread.title_full: Tokyo launches design competition for new Olympic logo

author: wtopstaff
title: Tokyo launches design competition for new Olympic logo
text:
Home » News » Sports » Tokyo launches design competition… Tokyo launches design competition for new Olympic logo By The Associated Press October 16, 2015 11:30 am London Mayor Boris Johnson, left, greets Olympics Minister Toshiaki Endo during his visit in Tokyo, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015. (Kyodo News via AP) JAPAN OUT, MANDATORY CREDIT 
TOKYO (AP) — Japanese organizers have launched the design competition for a new logo for the 2020 Tokyo Olympics to replace the emblem that was dropped amid plagiarism allegations. 
The organizing committee says the competition is “open to everyone regardless of previous experience or formal qualifications,” including individuals or groups. 
Applications can be submitted online from Nov. 24 to Dec. 7. The winning entry will be announced next spring and sent to the Tokyo 2020 executive board for final approval. 
The initial emblem came under intense scrutiny because of its similarity to the logo of a theater in Belgium. The Japanese emblem’s designer, Kenjiro Sano, stood by his work but it was eventually withdrawn. Topics:
